Comment: "He looked at me with tears in his eyes and said - 'Sir. I'm so, so, so very very sorry that I've been such a Trump hating, fake news journalist. You are by far the greatest president the country and the world has ever known. I can't live knowing I blasphemed you so.' and then he turned and just jumped out the window. Petey saw it, didn't you Pete? Yeah good boy."
